subject: Bicycles and Bicycling
Tour de France (Bicycle Race)
Doping (Sports)
lead_paragraph: From the mid-1960s to the mid-’70s, Eddy Merckx, a five-time Tour de France champion, entered every race there was, from lowly midweek criterium to the major three-week tours.
snippet: From the mid-1960s to the mid-’70s, Eddy Merckx, a five-time Tour de France champion, entered every race there was, from lowly midweek criterium to the major three-week tours.
